titleStmt.title: The Kitchin-physician, or, A guide for good-housewives in maintaining their families in health wherein are described the natures, causes, and symptoms of all diseases, inward and outward, incident to the bodies of men, women, and children : prescribing natural, useful and proper published for the common good ... by T.K., Doctor in Physick.
titleStmt.author: T. K., Doctor in physick.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in British Library.
